tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE education_trends (
    country_code VARCHAR(3),
    year INT,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    initiative_description TEXT,
    initiative_start_date DATE,
    initiative_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research_analysis (
    research_id INT,
    research_topic VARCHAR(255),
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
    publication_date DATE,
    citation_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE initiatives (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_year INT,
  end_year INT,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(100),
  researcher VARCHAR(50),
  start_year INT,
  end_year INT
);
